information.title: Reward System Information
information.subtitle: Learn about Layer Rewards and BCC Release Mechanisms
information.layerRewardsSystemDesc: When members in your matrix upgrade membership levels, corresponding layer rewards are triggered. 19 layers total, each layer reward equals 100% of the corresponding level NFT price
information.layerRewardsMobileDesc: When members in your matrix upgrade membership levels, corresponding layer rewards are triggered. 19 layers total, each layer reward amount is 100% of the corresponding level NFT price.
information.layerRewardsDialogDesc: Comprehensive explanation of the 19-layer reward system, including eligibility rules and payout mechanisms
information.matrixPrincipleDesc: BEEHIVE uses a 19-layer 3×3 matrix system, with each level representing one layer in the matrix.
information.condition1: Members in layers upgrade membership levels
information.condition2: Trigger corresponding rewards based on upgrade level
information.condition3: Each layer can receive multiple rewards
information.layerRewardsDescription: Understand how layer rewards work when members in your matrix upgrade their membership levels. Each layer has specific eligibility requirements and reward amounts.
information.bccRewardsDescription: Learn about the four-phase BCC release system based on member activation milestones. Rewards decrease progressively to ensure long-term sustainability.
information.matrixDescription: This visualization shows how the matrix structure works. When members upgrade levels in your layers, it triggers corresponding layer rewards.
information.layerRewardsDetailDescription: Comprehensive explanation of the 19-layer reward system with eligibility rules and payout mechanisms.
information.bccRewardsDetailDescription: Four-phase BCC release system with decreasing rewards based on total activated member count.
